extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Identify devices with firmware version FW07 or lower.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade affected devices to the latest standard firmware version higher than FW07.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Network and Port Restrictions
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the device, disable unused TCP/UDP ports, and disable web-based management ports 80/443 after the configuration phase.
